catch_copy: Meet the Valley of Dragons, where a group of young dragons must embark on a crucial mission to protect their home and forge alliances with other dragon communities.
description:
In this visual novel you can learn about the power of dragons and friendship. Led by Draco, Ember, Fang, Luna and Ignis, they will face challenges, discover ancient secrets and demonstrate that unity and hope are their greatest strengths.

Main Features

· A Story of Togetherness and Bravery: Follow Draco and his friends on their journey to find an ancient artifact that can protect their valley from a dark threat.

·Epic Challenges: Enchanted forests and mysterious oceans where dragons face trials that will test their courage and purity of heart.

·Formation of Alliances: Learn about the various dragon communities, including the Community of Winds, the Forest of Whispers, the City of Clouds, the Island of Fire, the Shrine of Ice and the Community of the Sea.

·Magic and Mystery: Discover ancient secrets and learn about the magic that unites dragons and their land.

Stunning Visuals: Enjoy dazzling, detailed and colorful settings that bring this exciting story to life.

Why You Will Love It?

·A Family Adventure: Perfect for children and young people who love fantasy and adventure stories full of positive values.

·Unforgettable Characters: Meet Draco, Ember, Fang, Luna and Ignis, and follow their stories of growth, friendship and courage.

·Inspirational Messages: A story that celebrates the importance of unity, courage and hope, teaching valuable lessons in an entertaining way.

Join these young dragons in "Dragons Crossing: Legend of Dream Land" and discover an adventure that will inspire you.
formal_name: Dragons Crossing: Legend of Dream Land
network_feature_description:
